snippet: Calvin Mosby, 28, and Devaunte Starks, 17, have been charged with first-degree murder in the death of an 8-year-old Detroit boy who was struck by a bullet as he slept, prosecutors said Monday.
abstract: Calvin Mosby and Devaunte Starks face charges of first-degree murder in death of 8-year-old Detroit boy Jakari Pearson, who was killed when bullet went through wall at his home at Brewster Homes pubic housing project.
lead_paragraph: Calvin Mosby, 28, and Devaunte Starks, 17, have been charged with first-degree murder in the death of an 8-year-old Detroit boy who was struck by a bullet as he slept, prosecutors said Monday.

headline.main: Michigan: Two Charged in Killing of Sleeping Boy
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Two Charged in Killing of Sleeping Boy
